relationships.description: Communicating about media strategy, politics, and personal plans
Wolff has insider access to Bannon and is discussing his political strategy
Relationship being discussed as key to managing sexual abuse allegations

analysis.purpose: Discuss media strategy for Woody Allen's sexual abuse allegations and political strategy involving Bannon
analysis.significance: Shows behind-the-scenes media manipulation strategy for high-profile sexual abuse case and political insider communications

concerns: Discussion of sexual abuse allegations and strategic response

notable_quotes: "If Dylan is coming out to speak publicly, Soon-Yi also has to. If Dylan is allowed to be the center of this story, Woody is cooked."
"the connecticut (hired by the state) report front page. -- WE interviewed dylan Nine times. two professionals AT THE TIME. we conclude that the story is fantasy."
red_flags: Strategic discussion of how to manage sexual abuse allegations
Request to avoid email for sensitive details
Reference to Harvey Weinstein in sarcastic context during sensitive discussion

blackmail_indicators.description: No evidence of blackmail or coercion - appears to be strategic media and legal advice

illegal_activity.description: No first-hand illegal activity discussed - primarily media strategy and political commentary

details: Discussion of media strategy for Woody Allen allegations
Reference to 60 Minutes producer Ira Rosen

public_knowledge.context: Woody Allen sexual abuse allegations were widely publicized; Steve Bannon's relationship with Trump was major political news in 2018

analysis.summary: Email chain between Michael Wolff and Jeffrey E. discussing media strategy for Woody Allen's sexual abuse allegations, including plans for Soon-Yi to publicly support Allen, along with political strategy discussions about Steve Bannon's potential break with Trump and Wolff's book promotion activities.
